mappings:
[% controllers.forEach(function(controller) { %]
com.[%= companylower %].[%= namelower %].commons.dto.[%= controller.nameCamel %]Dto com.[%= companylower %].[%= namelower %].model.[%= controller.entity %]DO [% controller.properties.forEach(function(property) { %] [%= property.nameCamel%] [%= property.nameCamel%] [% }); %] [% });%]
